item.title: Clan chat error
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

I haven’t coded in a while but java is case sensitive. Find that code and add this:

[code] person.sendQuest(“Chatting in: @whi@” +c
lanName, 5450);

                                    person.sendQuest("Clan leader: @whi@" +c

lanLeader, 3206);[/code]

Yeh i think thats the rite thing because the guy above me said the same thing…

Read full topic

person.sendQuest("Chatting in: @whi@" +clanName, 5450); person.sendQuest("Clan leader: @whi@" +clanLeader, 3206);

item.title: Clan chat error
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay im adding this clan chat its old but it works. so i added it and i got like 23 errors so i fixed something now i got 2 and idk how to fix it.

here are the errors

[code]client.java:359: illegal start of expression
person.sendQuest(“Chatting in: @whi@” +c
lanName+, 5450);

    ^

client.java:360: illegal start of expression
person.sendQuest(“Clan leader: @whi@” +c
lanLeader+, 3206);

      ^

2 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

wats that mean?
